content.div:
The ScotlandPHP Conference is back! Saturday 6th October 2018, EICC, Edinburgh
Join the worldwide PHP community for the third ScotlandPHP conference. There will be 14 talks presented across 2 tracks, along with 4 workshops to help you enhance your current skills and find out what's next for PHP and beyond. We're planning 2 social events so you can network with both the speakers and other attendees. This year we'll be hosting the conference in the world-class Edinburgh International Conference Centre, right in the city-centre. We've curated an amazing selection of speakers talking about a wide range of topics of interest to PHP developers and the wider web-development community. See the lineup here
